name: Simulate Microbial Population Dynamics
description: Simulate microbial population dynamics with multiple interacting species
run: git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni /tmp/biomni && pip install -q -e /tmp/biomni && python /mnt/code/simulate_microbial_population_dynamics.py

fields.name: species_params
fields.description: List of dictionaries containing parameters for each species

fields.name: interactions
fields.description: List of dictionaries describing interactions between species
